compactVend.name: Unison Compact HTST Milk Vending Machine Pasteurizer
compactVend.informationParagraph: Designed for Milk Vending Machines. This model of pasteurizer will include automatic filling and a facility for cleaning the vending machine tank. All machine cleaning data is automatically logged by the pasteurizer

compactRegular.name: Unison Compact HTST Pasteurizer
compactRegular.suitable: Milk, Cheese Milk, Juice, Cider, Beer, Wine
